title: Kevin Volland - Wikipedia
snippet: Kevin Volland (born 30 July 1992) is a German professional footballer who plays as a striker or a winger for 3. Liga club 1860 Munich. He has had 15 caps for the Germany national team. Volland gained prominence at the 2015 UEFA European Under-21 Championship where he was awarded the Silver Boot.

title: Kevin Volland | MLSsoccer.com
snippet: Kevin Volland is a young right winger scored 11 goals and assisted on 9 others in the Bundesliga this season. He is the captain of the Under-21 German national team.
